title: Elon’s Earthquake (Ep 1747)
description:
Elon launches an astounding bid to buy ALL of Twitter! In this episode, I address the fallout, and what it really means for the future of social media, and the country. 

News Picks:

Breaking: Elon Musk offers to buy ALL of Twitter.

A huge blow to Russia in the Black Sea.


Students have to fight for a moment of silence, while liberals fight to openly sexualize your kids.


Another account is suspended by Twitter for exposing liberal madness.


A troubling update on the BLM/ANTIFA insurrection at the White House.


The DOJ is being used as a tool to enforce the political demands of the left.
